name: Quality Escapes Prevention Agent
tagline: Catches potential quality issues before they escape to customers
overview: The Quality Escapes Prevention Agent uses pattern recognition across process data, inspection results, and historical defect patterns to identify products at elevated risk of quality issues. It alerts quality teams to investigate before products ship, reducing customer-facing defects.
whatItDoes: Monitors process parameters against quality control limits
Identifies products with elevated defect risk based on patterns
Correlates process deviations with historical quality outcomes
Prioritizes inspection focus on high-risk units
Generates root cause hypotheses for quality investigations
prompts: Which units from today's production have elevated risk?
What process parameters correlate with this defect type?
Show me the risk profile for this serial number
What's driving the increased scrap rate on Line 3?
Which inspection stations should we prioritize today?
inputs: Process parameter data (torque, temperature, cycle time)
guardrails: Risk scores are flags for investigation, not automatic holds
Human quality engineers make all disposition decisions
Does not replace required inspections or tests
Model performance validated against actual escapes
whatsNext: Developing proof of concept with engine assembly plant. Defining data integration and alert workflows.
